column4: hi, does anyone know which files from my home I have to remove for unity-2d to be 'clean'? unity-2d works okay for the rest of the users in my PC but it crashes on my user upon login
I don't know, but you could create a test user account and install a program called xxdiff which lets you compare directories. Run 'xxdiff ~ /home/testuser` and find out what's different.
yes, I thought about that but it would be a bit inconvenient
